author: jling
title: Irish duo Jedward claim they’re set for a collaboration with Ed Sheeran next year

organizations.name: warner music group brits after party

text:
OFF THEIR EDS Irish duo Jedward claim they’re set for a collaboration with Ed Sheeran next year 
The X Factor twins claim they are "close pals" with the superstar and will work with him in 2018 as they transform their musical style Exclusive By STUART PINK, Deputy Showbiz and Bizarre Editor, and JACK LING 23rd February 2017, 11:13 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments IRISH duo Jedward have sensationally claimed to have lined up a collaboration with superstar and “close pal” Ed Sheeran in 2018. 
Ed , 26, capped off an incredible return to music by performing with Stormzy at the Brit Awards 2017 on Wednesday. PA:Press Association 4 Ed Sheeran was among the first to arrive at the Brits on Wednesday 
X Factor twins John and Edward Grimes , 25, finished runners-up in Celebrity Big Brother 2017 earlier in February. 
And speaking at the Universal Brits after-party, John revealed they were enlisting the help of Ed as they prepare to transform their music style next year. 
He said: “We’re good with Ed, we’re close. We’ve known him since before he made it big. 
“This year we’re concentrating on EDM music. Next year we’ll do more stripped back stuff, which is where Ed will come in.” related stories BIRTHDAY HIT Ed Sheeran celebrates 26th birthday by dropping new song and gets a VERY unusual 'cake' made for him Incr-ed-ible What is Ed Sheeran's new single How Would You Feel (Paean) and when is album 'Divide' out? THE BRITISH ARE COMING Ed Sheeran and James Corden spotted filming Carpool Karaoke on the streets of LA Wedding bells? Ed Sheeran admits he feels 'pretty good' about possibility of marrying ‘childhood sweetheart’ Sheer hell Ed Sheeran fan 'may have to sell her car' after mistakenly forking out £1,300 for tickets to his gig KING OF HIS CASTLE Ed Sheeran confirmed as latest act to perform at the 2017 Brit Awards Getty Images 4 Ed recently made his triumphant comeback to music 
Last month Ed joined the ranks of chart legends by being one of the only artists to hit No1 and No2 with two songs released on the same day. 
After more than a year out of the limelight, Ed debuted two new singles — Castle On The Hill and Shape Of You. 
Jedward, by contrast, completed their impressive second outing on Celebrity Big Brother 2017, finishing second behind Loose Women presenter Coleen Nolan . Splash News Jedward at the Warner Music Group BRITs After Party SilverHub The pair turned up to the bash at the Freemasons’ Hall having also attended the Universal do Jedward's John dons Bianca Gascoigne's thong in Celebrity Big Brother 
But they couldn't celebrate for long as they found out their father had been hospitalised during their reality stint. 
But during a live Periscope session with their fans which the twins publicised on Twitter this month, the stars revealed he’s on the mend as they answered fans' questions online. 
They said: “Our Dad’s really really good.”
